message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $190.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $180?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go down to $180. I'm willing to meet you at $185, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $185, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $180, or even consider meeting me at $182?
I'm not willing to go down to $182, but I'm willing to meet you at $187. That's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $187 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $183?
I'm not willing to go down to $183, but I'm willing to meet you at $188. That's my final offer.
